?Attention! The activity of enemy tactical aviation is observed in the eastern direction!  The threat of using aviation weapons!
Missile danger for the Kharkiv region.
Countering the threat of attack UAVs in the regions.
Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: BpLA in the north of Mykolaiv Oblast, movement vector to the north.  A shock UAV is approaching Kropyvnytskyi from the southwest.
Unmanned aerial vehicle in the north of Mykolaiv Oblast, vector of movement to the north.
BpLA in Kompaniivsky district, Kirovohrad region, direction to Kropyvnytskyi.
UAVs in the west and east of the Mykolayiv region are moving in the direction of the Kirovohrad region.
UAVs from Dnipropetrovsk region enter Zaporizhzhia, the vector of movement to the south.
BpLA in the Kherson region changed the direction of movement towards Mykolaiv.
The BpLA group is approaching Pavlograd from the north.
UAVs in the Dnipropetrovsk region changed the vector of movement in the direction of Pavlograd.
Several new groups of attack enemy UAVs from the south in the Kherson region, the vector of movement is northeast.
UAVs from the Kharkiv region enter the Dnipropetrovsk region, the direction of movement of the Dnipro.
Countering the missile threat for Kyiv, Chernihiv, Sumy and Cherkasy regions.
UAV on the border of Kharkiv and Poltava regions, heading south.
Myrhorod in shelter.
The first cruise missile also changed direction in the direction of Myrhorod.
Another cruise missile in the south of Sumy Oblast, heading for Poltava Oblast (roughly Myrhorod).
